products.name: Free Morning Coffee
products.description: A subscription service that delivers a freshly brewed cup of premium coffee to your doorstep every morning at no cost. Simply sign up and enjoy artisanal coffee from local roasters, delivered hot and ready to drink.

products.name: AI Personal Assistant
products.description: A smart AI assistant that learns your habits and automates your daily routine - scheduling meetings, ordering groceries, managing bills, and even suggesting activities based on your mood. Available 24/7 through voice commands.

products.name: Overpriced Plastic Cup
products.description: A standard plastic disposable cup priced at $1,000. It's just a regular cup with no special features - the same kind you'd get at a fast food restaurant. No warranty, no returns.

products.name: New Email App
products.description: Yet another email application with a slightly different interface. It has all the standard features you'd expect - inbox, sent mail, drafts, spam filter. Compatible with Gmail and Outlook.

products.name: Weather Widget
products.description: A desktop widget that shows the current weather and a 5-day forecast. It updates every hour and displays temperature, humidity, and chance of rain. Free to download.

products.name: Smart Meal Planner
products.description: An AI-powered meal planning app that creates personalized weekly menus based on your dietary preferences, budget, and nutritional goals. Includes grocery lists and step-by-step recipes. Subscription: $15/month.

products.name: Vintage Vinyl Record Player
products.description: A handcrafted wooden record player combining 1960s aesthetics with modern sound engineering. Features Bluetooth connectivity, USB recording, and premium speakers. Limited edition, $599.
